medium: Illustrated book with reproductions of pen and ink drawings; includes two extra suites of illustrations
title: Candide
marks:
Edition

Inscribed in black ink, on colophon pag Unsigned
description: First US edition; 121 pages; bound in cloth boards with calf spine. An English translation of the German original of 1920.  There are two additional unbound illustrations stored in a sleeve: each sheet is 5 x 7; 26 sheets are yellow and 26 sheets are white.
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
